text: The men's 5000 metres event at the 1989 Summer Universiade was held at the Wedaustadion in Duisburg on 28 and 30 August 1989. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Stefano Mei '''' |Charles Cheruiyot '''' |Antonio Serrano '''' |} ==Results== ===Heats=== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center;font-size:95%" |- !
